Preterit.text: moṣele d-mḥaḏ̣árral-le səsyo w-sayfo w-rumḥo, w-mǧahazle b-u=slāḥ ʻhe left instructions for them to prepare a horse, a sword and a lance for him, and equiped him with a weaponʼ; 159; 36/72; [MT]; mǧaházle-le susyo w-mǧaházle-le fərqa d-ʕaskar ‘he equipped him with a horse and with a division of soldiers’; 36/80

Part. Pass..text: i=baladiye mšayaʕla zlamat mǧahze b-am=makkinat d-u=gāz ʻdie Stadtverwaltung schickte Männer, die mit Petroleumgeräten ausgerüstet warenʼ; 175; 1/35;
